body:
### Bzlmod (MODULE.bazel)

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.16")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "6.7")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")
maven.install(
    artifacts = [
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.16",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
use_repo(maven, "maven")
```

### Workspace

Add the `robolectric` and `rules_jvm_external` repositories in your WORKSPACE file:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "robolectric",
    sha256 = "cf04b4206b9d21b385e8dbee478fac619fc1344e8e46935dcec2d64939dd0525",
    strip_prefix = "robolectric-bazel-4.16",
    urls = ["https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/releases/download/4.16/robolectric-bazel-4.16.tar.gz"],
)
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    sha256 = "8475fae7a95463a4fd323a46b0f5601f89863ba019afa358cc9fa1d0e67cdd63",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.6.0/rules_java-8.6.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")

rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility

proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")

rules_java_toolchains()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()

load("@robolectric//bazel:robolectric.bzl", "robolectric_repositories")

robolectric_repositories()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_jvm_external",
    sha256 = "a1e351607f04fed296ba33c4977d3fe2a615ed50df7896676b67aac993c53c18",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm_external-6.7",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_jvm_external/releases/download/6.7/rules_jvm_external-6.7.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_jvm_external//:repositories.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_deps")

rules_jvm_external_deps()

load("@rules_jvm_external//:setup.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_setup")

rules_jvm_external_setup()

load("@rules_jvm_external//:defs.bzl", "maven_install")

maven_install(
    name = "maven",
    artifacts = [
        "com.google.truth:truth:1.1.3",
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.16",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Bump rules_jvm_external to 6.7 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/130
* Bump actions/checkout from 4 to 5 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/131
* Add support for Robolectric 4.16 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/132


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.15.1...4.16

### Bzlmod (MODULE.bazel)

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.15.1")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")
maven.install(
    artifacts = [
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.15.1",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
use_repo(maven, "maven")
```

### Workspace

Add the `robolectric` and `rules_jvm_external` repositories in your WORKSPACE file:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "robolectric",
    sha256 = "70ec803c93915d5b509f86c63d50f381b41ab70eb70e26086efc3d83b6de8529",
    strip_prefix = "robolectric-bazel-4.15.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/releases/download/4.15.1/robolectric-bazel-4.15.1.tar.gz"],
)
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    sha256 = "8475fae7a95463a4fd323a46b0f5601f89863ba019afa358cc9fa1d0e67cdd63",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.6.0/rules_java-8.6.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")

rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility

proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")

rules_java_toolchains()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()

load("@robolectric//bazel:robolectric.bzl", "robolectric_repositories")

robolectric_repositories()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_jvm_external",
    sha256 = "d31e369b854322ca5098ea12c69d7175ded971435e55c18dd9dd5f29cc5249ac",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm_external-5.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_jvm_external/releases/download/5.3/rules_jvm_external-5.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_jvm_external//:defs.bzl", "maven_install")

maven_install(
    name = "maven",
    artifacts = [
        "com.google.truth:truth:1.1.3",
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.15.1",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Support Robolectric 4.15.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/129


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.15...4.15.1

### Bzlmod (MODULE.bazel)

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.15")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")
maven.install(
    artifacts = [
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.15",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
use_repo(maven, "maven")
```

```starlark
# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility

proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")

rules_java_toolchains()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()

load("@robolectric//bazel:robolectric.bzl", "robolectric_repositories")

robolectric_repositories()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_jvm_external",
    sha256 = "d31e369b854322ca5098ea12c69d7175ded971435e55c18dd9dd5f29cc5249ac",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm_external-5.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_jvm_external/releases/download/5.3/rules_jvm_external-5.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_jvm_external//:defs.bzl", "maven_install")

maven_install(
    name = "maven",
    artifacts = [
        "com.google.truth:truth:1.1.3",
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.15",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update Bazel to 8.x by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/126
* Support Robolectric 4.15-beta-1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/127
* Support Robolectric 4.15 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/128


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.14.1.2...4.15

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.15-beta-1")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")

    ],
    repositories = [

```

### Workspace

```starlark
http_archive(

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
```

## What's Changed
* Update Bazel to 8.x by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/126
* Support Robolectric 4.15-beta-1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/127


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.14.1.2...4.15-beta-1

### Bzlmod (MODULE.bazel)

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.14.1.2")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")
maven.install(
    artifacts = [
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.14.1",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
use_repo(maven, "maven")
```

### Workspace

Add the `robolectric` and `rules_jvm_external` repositories in your WORKSPACE file:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "robolectric",
    sha256 = "b2d2164bae80fcfbdd078eb2f0935ba06557402b8c814928d9e3bec7358e2b7b",
    strip_prefix = "robolectric-bazel-4.14.1.2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/releases/download/4.14.1.2/robolectric-bazel-4.14.1.2.tar.gz"],
)
http_archive(
    name = "rules_java",
    sha256 = "8475fae7a95463a4fd323a46b0f5601f89863ba019afa358cc9fa1d0e67cdd63",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_java/releases/download/8.6.0/rules_java-8.6.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")

rules_java_dependencies()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility

proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")

# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")

rules_java_toolchains()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()

load("@robolectric//bazel:robolectric.bzl", "robolectric_repositories")

robolectric_repositories()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_jvm_external",
    sha256 = "d31e369b854322ca5098ea12c69d7175ded971435e55c18dd9dd5f29cc5249ac",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm_external-5.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_jvm_external/releases/download/5.3/rules_jvm_external-5.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_jvm_external//:defs.bzl", "maven_install")

maven_install(
    name = "maven",
    artifacts = [
        "com.google.truth:truth:1.1.3",
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.14.1",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Make robolectric-bazel work for bazel 6 and 7 by @ted-xie in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/123


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.11.1.2...4.14.1.2

## What's Changed
* Support Robolectric to 4.14.1 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/120


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.14...4.14.1

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.14")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")

    artifacts = [
        "org.robolectric:robolectric:4.14",
    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
```

```starlark
http_archive(

maven_install(
    name = "maven",
    artifacts = [
        "com.google.truth:truth:1.1.3",

    repositories = [
```

## What's Changed
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 6 to 7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/115
* Support Robolectric 4.14-beta-1 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/117
* Support Robolectric 4.14 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/118


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.13...4.14

### Bzlmod (MODULE.bazel)

> If using Bazel 6, make sure you set the `--enable_bzlmod` flag

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_robolectric", version = "4.13")

bazel_dep(name = "rules_jvm_external", version = "5.3")
maven = use_extension("@rules_jvm_external//:extensions.bzl", "maven")

    ],
    repositories = [
        "https://maven.google.com",
        "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2",
    ],
)
use_repo(maven, "maven")
```

## What's Changed
* Update release_prep.sh by @alexeagle in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/89
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/90
* Bump actions/cache from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/91
* Make robolectric-deps.properties public by @jylinv0 in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/92
* Bump bazelbuild/setup-bazelisk from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/93
* Update Bazel to 7.0.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/94
* Add Bazel version to presubmit by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/96
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 5 to 6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/97
* Support Robolectric 4.12 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/98
* Add windows and macos x86 & arm as CI running OSes by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/99
* Remove macos-14 from ci platform by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/100
* Add docs for publishing releases by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/102
* Update Bazel to 7.1.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/103
* Add supported tag pattern: *.* by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/104

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.11.1...4.12

## What's Changed
* Support Robolectric 4.11.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/77
* chore: automate releases by pushing a tag by @alexeagle in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/81
* Add CI Bazelrc to workflows directory by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/82
* Move buildifier into it's own workflow by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/83
* Break up the integration tests into jobs using test matrix by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/84
* Add test target for the release job to run by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/85
* Make release_prep.sh executable by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/86
* Fix type in release process by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/87

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/81

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.11...4.11.1

## What's Changed
* Update the maven coord version to 4.10.3 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/68
* Add bzlmod example to CI by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/69
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/70
* Add Bzlmod setup instructions to README by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/71
* Update rules_jvm_external to 5.3 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/72
* Update MODULE.bazel and WORKSPACE dependencies by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/74
* Support Robolectric 4.11 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/76
* Revert .bcr presubmit changes by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/80
* Update examples to 4.11 and update to Java 17 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/79

## What's Changed
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/49

* Use github workflows major version by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/53
* Update buildifier_prebuilt to 6.1.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/54
* Add example app by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/56
* Update .gitignore with more exclusions by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/57
* Migrate to http_jar from jvm_maven_import_external by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/55
* Add support for bzlmod by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/58

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/compare/4.9.1...4.9.2

Support for Robolectric 4.9.1 release. The complete changelog can be found [here](https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/releases/tag/robolectric-4.9.1).

```
http_archive(
```

## What's Changed
* [CI] Add job for linting starlark by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/37
* Update the README to point to the latest version of rules_jvm_external by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/38
* Bump rules_jvm_external to 4.5 by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/39
* Enable dependabot for github-actions by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/40
* Bump actions/setup-java from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/43
* Bump bazelbuild/setup-bazelisk from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/42
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.1 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/41
* Remove an extra empty line for README.md by @utzcoz in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/44
* Support Robolectric 4.9.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/45
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.1.0 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/46

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-bazel/pull/43
